contest-event.event-date: April 22, 1978 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Youth Strand on the Green De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 7 bands competed. Sept. 10, 2013, 8:28 a.m. May 23, 2014, 1:03 p.m. 1 Loughborough Youth Band Bud Fisher 2 Corby Beanfield School Donald Manning 3 Abraham Darby School Band C. J.
